TopicTitle: What was your best launch failure?

Articles.Content: Mine was when one of the launch clamps didn't separate when the rest did. when i staged it on the second stage icon above the engine and clamps my rocket was going at an angle. I started to lose it so i activated the launch escape system and got the command pod safely away. That staging mishap cost me a good rocket.
We have a perpetual thread for this sort of thing: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/32027-You-Will-Not-Go-To-Space-Today-Post-your-fails-here%21
